font.name: Tagger
font.desc: “Tagger” is inspired by Warsaw’s graffiti tags. It’s a modern script font with a dynamic character and casual forms. Tagger is a perfect fit for visual identity of bars, restaurants, shops. It can also be used for menus, price tags, labels and announcements.

author.name: Zuzanna Rogatty
author.desc: Graphic designer specialising in visual identity, lettering and typography. Graduated from the Graphic and Communication Design Dept. on Poznań Fine Arts University. Designer at Mamastudio. She is the author of the visual identity for Two Shores Festival, FAMA Festival, and others. Rogatty’s work was featured on several exhibitions such as: „Places of Origin: Polish Graphic Design in Context”, “Polish Logo Design Exhibition” and “Typopolo”.
